overview: This is the sensation that exploded across the country at the biggest horror conventions. Rarely does a movie cause such a stir in such an extreme crowd. Now you can enjoy the movie that caused deafening laughter, throat-shredding screams, and a storm of praise. It's the story of a victim who becomes inhabited by army ants that aggressively defend their host. Bullies beware!
title: Human Antfarm
